author: MSNBC
title: Ukraine-Russia war news updates: Fighting rages around Kyiv as Russian forces bombard major cities
description: Fighting and explosions raged outside Kyiv Saturday as Russian forces advanced on Ukraine's capital and continued to bombard cities already under siege.
content: Fighting and explosions raged outside Kyiv Saturday as Russian forces appeared to make fresh progress in their slow advance on Ukraine's capital and continued to bombard cities already under siege acâ€¦ [+4194 chars]
